description: This file defines a UI component called 'Button' using LightningJS framework, including its template, state, and input behavior.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a button that toggles its state when Enter is pressed.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Defines the initial state of the Button component, including 'isFavorited' and text labels.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handler for the Enter input, toggles the 'isFavorited' state.
